articles.title: BHP considering improved proposal for Anglo American after bid rejected, source says - MINING.COM - MINING.com
articles.description: BHP Group is considering making an improved offer for Anglo American after its $39 billion initial proposal was rejected.
articles.content:
BHP said it does not comment on what it called “rumour and speculation”, while Anglo American did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.
